name: Pocket Rally Race Drive Craft
description:
An ideal game for those who like cars, trucks and racing!

In this game you have to find a way to control your car and make it to the finish line first.

Each race has several rounds. Finish them and move on. You will probably have to get used to the control first. Show everyone what you are capable of and that you are not afraid of anything. Win every race you take part in!

Much fun!
